comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called 78 rpm, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 36988361@N08
comment._content: Hi! Thanks for letting us know, we just added it. BTW, the Leo Baeck Institute has 44 more recordings that are digitized and to which you can listen.

comment.author: 98941179@N00
comment._content:
Hello, Center for Jewish History, NYC,

No problem, happy to have you here.

Thanks for sharing your images here and also for the link to the recordings. Very interesting digitization project you have going on.

Best Regards,
Jeremy

comment.author: 28861891@N07
comment._content:
Thanks for sharing the audio and classic image.
When I worked at the Spertus Institute I remember gathering many heavy 78s like this. Those cantors had amazing voices!
